title: Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Stability & Reliability (Protect the Experience): Thread CRDT-aware operations through the adapter and persist them to a durable store (start with a Firestore-backed adapter in `server/src/collaboration/adapters/firestoreAdapter.ts`).
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Stability & Reliability (Protect the Experience): Add optimistic UI hooks in `code/src/` so editors can apply CRDT patches locally before the server ACK.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Stability & Reliability (Protect the Experience): Create corrupted wiki fixture payloads under `code/test/fixtures/`.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Stability & Reliability (Protect the Experience): Write UI tests that click the recovery button and verify the editors continue functioning.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Stability & Reliability (Protect the Experience): Ship offline caching: persist drafts locally (IndexedDB or browser storage) and add background sync queues so editors function during outages.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Stability & Reliability (Protect the Experience): Validate imports on the server by moving CSV/Markdown parsing into Express handlers and surfacing structured validation errors in the frontend.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Surface macro selections inside the ghost agent client so operators can trigger macros explicitly (hook into `code/components/AgentPanel/`).

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Add regression coverage so tool config changes (e.g., reintroducing `allowedFunctionNames`) fail fast before hitting the Gemini API.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Surface the currently focused artifact and unsaved edits inside the prompt once that state is exposed from the workspace UI.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Log sampled coordinate translations server-side to validate heuristics before expanding macro coverage.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Persist aggregated calibration metrics (including the selected transform model) to the backend so operators can compare drift across sessions.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Confirm the ghost agent can submit sequential feedback with screenshots attached using the updated dialog capture flow, and expose the loaded `html2canvas` helper via documentation so operators can debug capture failures.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Wire in truth-lock approvals and lore distillation cues (start with workflow stubs in `code/components/canon/`).

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Extend scene/chapter template renderers to surface the richer outlines directly in the workspace editors (`code/components/workspace/templates/`).
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Extend export flows so Dialogue Forge transcripts ride along with scene exports.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Interoperability & Collaboration (Connect People & Tools): Implement canon enforcement NPC memory mode enhancements flagged above once higher-priority automation work is stable.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Content Creation & Expansion (Build More, Faster): Cache Gemini-rendered thumbnails alongside the existing deterministic canvas fallback so social shares load instantly.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Content Creation & Expansion (Build More, Faster): Expose the same guidance inside the Family Tree tools.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Content Creation & Expansion (Build More, Faster): Break `WorkspaceArtifactPanel.tsx` into smaller editors if continued growth warrants.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Content Creation & Expansion (Build More, Faster): Add component-level tests for artifact filters, activity panel toggles, and modal wiring.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Content Creation & Expansion (Build More, Faster): Expand export formats: Dustland ACK, D&D cards, visual novel scenes, scripts, and auto-generated character sheets/campaign packets.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Content Creation & Expansion (Build More, Faster): Audit Atlas Intelligence blueprint outputs generated from lore briefs and extend scene/chapter templates with multi-beat outlines.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Reporting & Project Insights (Understand & Explore Work): Surface confirmation toasts instead of full reloads.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Reporting & Project Insights (Understand & Explore Work): Provide inline help for advanced AI modules and audit accessibility/responsiveness gaps.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Reporting & Project Insights (Understand & Explore Work): Expand the refreshed sidebar navigation to cover more artifact collections (scenes, factions, wiki hubs) after validating the new profile drawer split.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Reporting & Project Insights (Understand & Explore Work): Align artifact workspace header actions with the refreshed project overview layout.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Onboarding & Education (Help New Creators Succeed): Continue auditing tutorial interactions for accessibility issues.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Onboarding & Education (Help New Creators Succeed): Render the FAQ entries in `code/src/data/supportFaqs.ts` inside the support drawer.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Onboarding & Education (Help New Creators Succeed): Produce additional localization assets once core onboarding tasks stabilize.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Operational Excellence & Compliance (Keep Operations Running): Persist status records beyond process restarts (extend the status model in `server/src/routes/github/publishStatus.ts`).
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Operational Excellence & Compliance (Keep Operations Running): Stream updates to the client so the modal can expose queued/running states without polling.
Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Operational Excellence & Compliance (Keep Operations Running): Surface queued/running states inside the modal UI using the unwrapped job results.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Operational Excellence & Compliance (Keep Operations Running): Monitor the proxy for latency/quota regressions and backfill tests covering representative share payloads.

Automation Initiative Roadmap — Not Done › Operational Excellence & Compliance (Keep Operations Running): Confirm upcoming merge + preview runs stay stable before re-enabling additional deploy targets.

Product Roadmap — Phase 4 — Narrative & Game Pipelines: Story → module export supporting Dustland ACK, D&D cards, visual novel scenes, and script formats.
Product Roadmap — Phase 4 — Narrative & Game Pipelines: Automated exports for character sheets, campaign packets, AI asset prompts, and lore codexes.
Product Roadmap — Phase 5 — AI Companions & Muse Engine: Archivist agent that finds contradictions and suggests consistency fixes.
Product Roadmap — Phase 5 — AI Companions & Muse Engine: Muse agent providing inspiration, aesthetics, and poetic voice.
Product Roadmap — Phase 5 — AI Companions & Muse Engine: Game Designer agent that turns lore into encounters.
Product Roadmap — Phase 5 — AI Companions & Muse Engine: Conlang Steward agent that grows Darv.
Product Roadmap — Phase 5 — AI Companions & Muse Engine: NPC memory mode for canon-locked roleplay.
Product Roadmap — Phase 5 — AI Companions & Muse Engine: Truth/Canon lock workflow where every addition requires approval.
Product Roadmap — Phase 5 — AI Companions & Muse Engine: Lore distillation pipeline to produce mythic summaries from notes.
Product Roadmap — Final Vision: Migrate storage to the managed backend plan in `docs/firebase-backend-migration.md`, including auth, persistence, and role-aware access.

Productionization Roadmap — Collaboration & Offline-Resilient UX (do not implement yet): Decide on collaboration scope (real-time, turn-based, etc.) and add the necessary synchronization layer (websockets, CRDTs) for shared editing.
Productionization Roadmap — Collaboration & Offline-Resilient UX (do not implement yet): Implement optimistic UI updates with conflict resolution to keep the workspace fluid during network delays.

Productionization Roadmap — Collaboration & Offline-Resilient UX (do not implement yet): Add background draft syncing and local caching so editors remain usable when offline or during service interruptions.
Productionization Roadmap — AI Platform Hardening (low priority): Proxy Gemini (and future model) calls through a secure backend to keep API keys out of the client.

Productionization Roadmap — AI Platform Hardening (low priority): Capture the current exact-title recommendation heuristic used by templates and schedule richer ranking once higher-priority systems land.
Productionization Roadmap — Robust Import/Export & Publishing: Validate CSV/Markdown inputs on the server and return actionable schema errors to the client.
Productionization Roadmap — Robust Import/Export & Publishing: Turn “Publish Site” into a backend-driven export that produces deployable static bundles hosted on durable storage/CDNs.
Productionization Roadmap — Productization & Compliance (low priority): Layer in onboarding, documentation, accessibility, and localization improvements for first-time users.
Productionization Roadmap — Productization & Compliance (low priority): Establish policies for data retention, content moderation, and privacy covering generated and uploaded content.
Productionization Roadmap — Productization & Compliance (low priority): Provide support and education content (tutorials, FAQs) that make the product approachable for new creators.
